arabic: اَللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى مُحَمَّدٍ وَ آلِ مُحَمَّدٍ
اَللَّهُمَّ وَفِّرْ فِيْهِ حَظِّيْ مِنْ بَرَكَاتِهِ
translation: In the Name of Allāh, the All-beneficent, the All-merciful.
O' Allāh send Your blessings on Muhammad and the family of Muhammad.
O Allah: on this day, (please] save me a share of its blessings;
And make easy my way to the obtainment of its goodness;
And do not deprive me of Your approval of the good deeds (that I do on this day];
O He Who guides to the evident truth.
transliteration: allāhumma ṣalli `alā muḥammadin wa āli muḥammad
allāhumma waffir fīhi ḥaẓẓī min barakātih
